content.text:
# 2011 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards

| network = Multishow
| ratings =
| previous = 2010
| main = Multishow Brazilian Music Awards
| next = 2012
}}
The 2011 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2011 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2011) was held on 6 September 2011, at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Actor Bruno Mazzeo hosted the ceremony for the second consecutive time.
Winners and nominees
Nominees for each award are listed below; award winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
Voted categories
The winners of the following categories were chosen by fan votes.
